title: Atta Tarar, Badar Shahbaz visit Qamar Zaman Kaira’s residence to inquire about his health
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 25 (APP): Federal Minister for Information and Broadcasting Attaullah Tarar along with Prime Minister’s Media Coordinator Badar Shahbaz Warraich visited the residence of senior leader of the Pakistan Peoples Party (PPP) Qamar Zaman Kaira to inquire about his health.
Both the leaders prayed for the swift and complete recovery of Qamar Zaman Kaira who has recently undergone a heart surgery.
On the occasion, Attaullah Tarar conveyed Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif’s best wishes for Qamar Zaman Kaira’s speedy recovery.
“Qamar Zaman Kaira is a veteran politician and a staunch advocate of democratic values,” the minister said, adding he holds him in high regard, as their families have enjoyed longstanding ties.
Badar Shahbaz Warraich also praised Qamar Zaman Kaira’s constructive role in national politics. The entire nation is praying for his swift recovery, he added.
